Text:
Classification: Reality
Genre: Family | How To/Do It Yourself | Talent
Status: New Series
Network: Discovery Velocity ( USA)
Airs: Saturdays at 09:00 pm
Runtime: 30 Minutes
Premiere: January 07, 2012

"SAW DOGS" introduces viewers to "Master Carver" Steve Blanchard and the little-known folk art of "Chainsaw Carving." This artform combines best in brawn, horsepower and muscle - with the result being high-end wooden sculptures commissioned by some of the world's top clients.

(http://www.tvrage.com/shows/id-30560)
